title: FO-12: Integration (State Machine, Pages, Registration)
description:
## Scope

Delivers the state machine (fo-experience.tsx), all page scaffolding (page.tsx, layout.tsx, layout client, info page), and registration (nav.config.ts, overview page). This is the wiring layer that connects foundation code (types, actions, agents) with UI components.

## Spec Reference

`docs/projects/2026-02-16-fo-12/2026-02-16-fo-12-spec.md` — Sections: "State Machine", "Generation Timing", "Data Flow", "Registration", "File Structure"

## Key Files

- `app/fo-12/components/fo-experience.tsx` — Main state machine (3-phase selection flow, check-in screens, dynamic generation, global counter)
- `app/fo-12/page.tsx` — Main page
- `app/fo-12/layout.tsx` — Layout wrapper
- `app/fo-12/fo-12-layout-client.tsx` — Client layout with implementation provider
- `app/fo-12/info/page.tsx` — Info page using InfoPageWrapper
- `nav.config.ts` — Add FO-12 nav entry (MODIFY existing file)
- `app/overview/page.tsx` — Add FO-12 version card (MODIFY existing file)

## Worker Instructions

- Complete tasks in order (they build on each other)
- Read `docs/projects/2026-02-16-fo-12/implementation-notes.md` before starting
- Append your learnings to `docs/projects/2026-02-16-fo-12/implementation-notes.md` when all tasks are done
- The state machine is the most complex part: 16 steps (0-15), 3-phase affirmation selection, check-ins, dynamic generation, pool exhaustion handling
- Reference FO-11's fo-experience.tsx heavily but restructure for the new flow
- Generation timing: batch 1 during heart animation (before Start screen), batch 2 after check-in 1, batch 3 after check-in 2, emergency batch in phase 3
